name: ledj
description: Load Elements Dynamically from JSON - A JavaScript library that creates repeated HTML elements from a JSON file.

scripts.clean: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:docs
scripts.uglify-css: npm run uglify-css:dist && npm run uglify-css:docs
scripts.uglify: npm run uglify-css && npm run uglify-js
scripts.copy-css: npm run copy-css:dist && npm run copy-css:docs
scripts.copy-js: npm run copy-js:dist && npm run copy-js:docs
scripts.copy: npm run copy-css && npm run copy-js
scripts.build:js: npm run uglify-js && npm run copy-js
scripts.build:css: npm run uglify-css && npm run copy-css
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:js && npm run build:css
